long_description: The OnGuard Bulldog STD U-lock delivers moderate security for your bicycle, resisting many types of attacks to help keep your beloved ride protected. Hefty 13mm (0.51 in.) hardened steel shackle resists cutting, prying and jacking; rubber-coated shackle and crossbar help protect your bike's finish. Dual lock down mechanism secures both sides of the shackle for excellent pull resistance. Bump-proof Z-Cylinder tumbler resists picking, pulling or drilling. Rounded design and centered keyhole eliminate pry points; extra-thick, molded end caps protect against bumps and hits. Comes with 5 laser-cut keys, 1 of which has an integrated LED light; mounting bracket Included. OnGuard rates the Bulldog STD U-lock as a 63 out of 100 on its 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: The OnGuard Bulldog STD U-lock delivers moderate security for your bicycle, resisting many types of attacks to help keep your beloved ride protected.
